metadata.title: CVE-2023-34049 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Salt-SSH pre-flight option copies the script to the target at apredictable path, which allows an attacker to force Salt-SSH to run theirscript. If an attacker has access to the target VM and knows the path tothe pre-flight script before it runs they can ensure Salt-SSH runs theirscript with the privileges of the user running Salt-SSH.Â Do not make thecopy path on the target predictable and ensure we check return codes of thescp command if the copy fails.

criterions.comment: salt package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
